adjectives.description: illusionary (comparative more illusionary, superlative most illusionary)

entries.meaning: Illusory; pertaining to an illusion, or of the nature of an illusion.
examples: It is all illusionary today — the fantasy of cowboyism, the western Yippee Syndrome of spurs that jingle, jangle, jingle, of hats as large as Bangalore parasols, of boots smeared with the residue of cowlots  […]
